org.modelio.api.module.commands

Class DefaultModuleContextualCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.api.module.commands.DefaultModuleContextualCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModuleContextualCommand

    public class DefaultModuleContextualCommand
extends Object
implements IModuleContextualCommand
    Default implementation of the IModuleContextualCommand interface.

    This default implementation may be inherited by the module developers in order to simplify the code writing of a contextual command.

        public boolean accept(List<MObject> selectedElements,

        The command accepts by default the selected elements.
        Specified by:
        accept in interface IModuleContextualCommand
        Parameters:

        module - Owner of the command
        Returns:

      • isActiveFor

        public boolean isActiveFor(List<MObject> selectedElements,

        The command is active by default.
        Specified by:
        isActiveFor in interface IModuleContextualCommand
        Parameters:
        selectedElements - Current selection
        module - Owner of the command
        Returns:
